data.name: Luminera: The Radiant Journey
data.detailed_description:
Roll the Dice to decide your fate!

Luminera is a turn based RPG with point and click exploration. Heavily inspired by Avatar: The Last Airbender and D&D Mechanics, Luminera is an attempt to create a fun single player D&D experience with an imaginative world focused on 8 different elements and how they influence different cultures. Play one of 6 playthroughs on Guided Adventure or Build Your Own Adventure and select your own team. Each character brings something special to the table from taking Assassination contracts with Kyra, growing plants with Melody or learning to cook with Luta.

24 characters have come together to embark on a Pilgrimage to visit the 8 Elemental Conduits. They'll soon find that their journey will be wrought with the dangers of the wild and the tragedies of war. Each member is taking this Pilgrimage for their own personal reason, and you'll learn about your characters' backstory over time as the journey progresses.

data.short_description: Roll the Dice to decide your fate in this Turn Based, Point and Click RPG!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
